name.description: A name for Paper NFT could be - e.g. Paper Title

description.description: A description about Paper provided by PaperScore

image.description: A URI pointing to a resource with mime type image/* representing the asset to which this token represents. Consider making any images at a width between 320 and 1080 pixels and aspect ratio between 1.91:1 and 4:5 inclusive.

properties.description: Arbitrary properties. Values may be strings, numbers, object or arrays.
